typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		timeperiod as string,
		flow1 as integer,
		occupancy1 as double,
		speed1 as double,
		flow2 as integer,
		occupancy2 as double,
		speed2 as double,
		flow3 as integer,
		occupancy3 as double,
		speed3 as double,
		flow4 as integer,
		occupancy4 as double,
		speed4 as double,
		flow5 as integer,
		occupancy5 as double,
		speed5 as double,
		flow6 as integer,
		occupancy6 as double,
		speed6 as double,
		flow7 as integer,
		occupancy7 as double,
		speed7 as double,
		flow8 as integer,
		occupancy8 as double,
		speed8 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		timeperiod,
		flow1,
		occupancy1,
		speed1,
		flow2,
		occupancy2,
		speed2,
		flow3,
		occupancy3,
		speed3,
		flow4,
		occupancy4,
		speed4,
		flow5,
		occupancy5,
		speed5,
		flow6,
		occupancy6,
		speed6,
		flow7,
		occupancy7,
		speed7,
		flow8,
		occupancy8,
		speed8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		timeperiod as string,
		flow1 as integer,
		occupancy1 as double,
		speed1 as double,
		flow2 as integer,
		occupancy2 as double,
		speed2 as double,
		flow3 as integer,
		occupancy3 as double,
		speed3 as double,
		flow4 as integer,
		occupancy4 as double,
		speed4 as double,
		flow5 as integer,
		occupancy5 as double,
		speed5 as double,
		flow6 as integer,
		occupancy6 as double,
		speed6 as double,
		flow7 as integer,
		occupancy7 as double,
		speed7 as double,
		flow8 as integer,
		occupancy8 as double,
		speed8 as double,
		station as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1000,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['**']) ~> traffic
traffic derive(flow1 = flow1 + 1) ~> RegistrationDT
RegistrationDT sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		timeperiod,
		flow1,
		occupancy1,
		speed1,
		flow2,
		occupancy2,
		speed2,
		flow3,
		occupancy3,
		speed3,
		flow4,
		occupancy4,
		speed4,
		flow5,
		occupancy5,
		speed5,
		flow6,
		occupancy6,
		speed6,
		flow7,
		occupancy7,
		speed7,
		flow8,
		occupancy8,
		speed8,
		station
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserDataSink
